attributes.action: Make the 26th of December a Bank Holiday for retail staff and close shops
attributes.additional_details:
Retail staff should be allowed time off to spend with their families every Christmas. 
Shoppers can organize themselves around dates. 
Benefits :
•	Families can have a better-quality Christmas
•	Children can spend time with parents
•	Increased opportunities to spend time outdoors
•	Reduce stress
•	Improve mental health
The environment will benefit from less traffic and only a reduced transport service will be required. 
Let’s make FAMILY time a real option for all.
attributes.background:
Make the 26th of December a Bank Holiday for retail staff and close shops, essential and non-essential. 
This year, Asda, Marks & Spencer, Aldi, Waitrose, John Lewis and other shops will remain closed on Boxing Day, causing a beneficial impact on wellbeing, mental health and environment.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562108
